phlogiston.assembler.predicates

Predicates for use in scanning Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) assembly language.

pure bool isWhitespace(const char c);
This predicate indicates whether or not the given character is considered a whitespace character.

Params:
char c The character to test.

Returns:
true if character is whitespace, false otherwise.

Examples:
assert(isWhitespace(' ') == true);
assert(isWhitespace('\t') == true);
assert(isWhitespace('\n') == true);
assert(isWhitespace('\r') == true);
assert(isWhitespace('a') == false);
